addonManifest.name: Amazon SQS
addonManifest.description: Amazon Simple Queue Service (SQS) is a fast, reliable, scalable, fully managed message queuing service.
addonManifest.author: Chris Dutra

property.description: If set to true, each developer will need to provide their own Amazon credentials.
Sets specific attributes on a queue. You can specify DelaySeconds, MaximumMessageSize, MessageRetentionPeriod, Policy, ReceiveMessageWaitTimeSeconds, and VisibilityTimeout
Default name of the queue if none is specified by the developer.
